quote: The hours here are flat and round, disks of gray layered one on top of the other...they move slowly, at a grind, until it seems as though they are not moving at all. They are just pressing down...
quote_letters: THE HOURS HERE ARE FLAT AND ROUND DISKS OF GRAY LAYERED ONE ON TOP OF THE OTHERTHEY MOVE SLOWLY AT A GRIND UNTIL IT SEEMS AS THOUGH THEY ARE NOT MOVING AT ALL THEY ARE JUST PRESSING DOWN
